# Contributing to Goods Unite Us

Everything below this line was stolen from an example somewhere and should be reviewed before it's published.  

Thank you for considering contributing to the **Goods Unite Us** iOS app! We welcome your ideas, improvements, and bug fixes to help make this platform better for everyone.

---

## How to Contribute

### 1. Fork the Repository

Start by [forking the repository](https://github.com/goodsuniteus/ios-app/fork) and cloning it to your local machine.

```bash
git clone https://github.com/Goods-Unite-Us/goods-unite-us-public-template.git
cd goods-unite-us-public-template
```

### 2. Create a Branch

Create a new branch for your feature or fix:

```bash
git checkout -b feature/your-feature-name
```

### 3. Make Changes

- Follow the existing coding style and architecture
- Add or update documentation as needed
- Write tests for your changes (unit/UI tests)
- Commit your changes with clear messages

### 4. Run Tests

Ensure all tests pass before submitting your pull request:

```bash
Cmd + U  # Run in Xcode
```

### 5. Submit a Pull Request

Push your branch to your fork and [open a pull request](https://github.com/goodsuniteus/goods-unite-us-public-template/pulls) against the `main` or `dev` branch. Include a description of your changes and reference any relevant issues. When available, please follow the pull request template.

---

## Code Style & Standards

- Use **some linting framework** if configured
- Use **some format checker** if configured
- Use descriptive naming conventions
- Follow best practices for **some language we're using**
- Modularize and document new functionality where appropriate
- Add a short description of your changes to [CHANGELOG.md](./CHANGELOG.md) file
- Check that your local code is current and fix merge conflicts when relevant

---

## Feedback and Communication

- Please be respectful in all interactions! Please see the [Code of Conduct](./CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md) for details
- Join our community conversations for discussions or questions
  - Discussions: [GitHub Discussions](https://github.com/Goods-Unite-Us/goods-unite-us-public-template/discussions)
  - Discord: [Community Discord server](https://discord.com/goods-unite-us-community)
  - Reddit: [r/goodsuniteuscommunity](https://reddit/r/goodsuniteuscommunity)
- Find a bug or have an idea for a feature? Open a [GitHub Issue](https://github.com/Goods-Unite-Us/goods-unite-us-public-template/issues)
- Contact us by email
  - Technical support: [support@goodsuniteus.com](mailto:support@goodsuniteus.com)
  - Security concerns: [security@goodsuniteus.com](mailto:security@goodsuniteus.com)

---
